text: yO vA aSva#syaq mEddhya#syaq SirOq vEda# SIr.ShaqNvAn mEddhyO# BavatyuqShA vA aSva#syaq mEddhya#syaq SiraqH sUryaqScakShuqrvAta#H prAqNaScaqndramAqH SrOtraqM diSaqH pAdA# avAntaradiqSAH par.Sa#vO&hOrAqtrE ni#mEqShO$&d^^rdhamAqsAH parvA#Niq mAsA$H saqdhAMnA$nyRuqtavO&~ggA#ni saM~Mvathsaqra AqtmA raqSmayaqH kESAq nakSha#trANi rUqpaM tAra#kA aqsthAniq naBO# mAq(gm)qsAnyOSha#dhayOq lOmA#niq vanaqspata#yOq vAlA# aqgnirmuKa#M ~MvaiSvAnaqrO vyAtta(gm)# - [  ] 53
